English: Castle courtyard
Castle tower
If someone told me seven years ago that one day my life would be saved by a Soviet soldier, I would laugh to his face.
But we live in strange times where nightmares become reality and dreams are clouded in darkness and uncertainty.
The fate of the island was one of a calm, peaceful nation full of simple people minding their small problems.\nBut destiny is a fickle lady.

Seven years ago, our freedom was challenged. We fought for it, but were betrayed.\nThe sickle and hammer hit hard. No stone was left unturned, no soul left unscathed, our dignity belittled and our pride shattered.
But we prevailed. We returned to prosperity and normality. We believed in peace. But sometimes it is not enough.
We are challenged once more, another was upon us. What is our desitny if not to suffer?\nWhat has fate left for us but to fight superior enemy and watch our homeland burn?
I am sorry for your people, commander.
It was you and your ilk who brought that suffering upon us. Again.
We were told to come and help the local government to reclaim the island. I did not know...
That the local government did not ask for your help and your presence here is basically an invasion?
If it means anything, I am sorry for that.
I appreaciate it. You are not responsible for the actions of your government,\nbut it is still uncomfortable welcoming you inside the walls of our castle.
No matter. My name is Gaston Astier, the commander of the Everon forces.
Sergei Rashiv, Soviet Army.
I know you helped my men. I know you helped me. You probably seek a way out of here, correct?
I do. And I've been told you are the only one who can help me.
Hm, the enemy has total control of both sea and air. It won't be easy to get past all the patrols.\nOnly a boat is a possible escape vehicle but you still have to get to Kolguyev in one piece...
I just need you to point me in a direction. I will go on alone if need be.
Nonsense, you wouldn't get far. I did have an idea in mind but never actually dared to pursue it.\nBut maybe you are crazy enough to do it.
If you don't see any other way... what needs to be done?
I have the necessary gear downstairs. Let's go.
You can't be serious.
We're going to get the Russian back to Kolguyev. Let's go, men!
Sparrow
